events.info: The Federal law on "gay propaganda" (135-FZ) set an administrative offense for "propaganda of non-traditional sexual relations" among minors.

note: The data we collected shows an increse in the number of hate crimes
According to our research, the number of crimes commited by organised groups increased

events.info: Article 72 of the Constitution defined marriage as the union of a man and a woman. The further adoption of laws on same-sex unions would be impossible without constitutional reform.

Federal Law No. 479-FZ set administrative responsibility for "propaganda of non-traditional sexual relations" in general (not only among minors). This law also banned the so-called "propaganda of pedophilia" and "propaganda of gender change"
Federal Law No. 386-FZ abolished the system of medical and legal procedures for transgender transition. Trans people no longer have the opportunity to receive necessary assistance.

events.description: Supreme Court: "International LGBT movement" is an extremist organisation
events.info: The so-called "International LGBT Movement" labelled as an extremist organization. It is a criminal offence to "participate" in such extremist organization.
